CustomField.description: This is a toggle to allow user to enter Picklist Values instead of using a dynamic SOQL Query to populate the option values of a Multi-Select Picklist. This field is only applicable if the UI Type is a 'Multi-Select Picklist' type.
CustomField.inlineHelpText:
Check this if Sub Query Source is NOT a SOQL Query.
If this value is checked, enter picklist values separated by the 'Enter' or 'Return' key if the Sub Query Source textbox.
CustomField.label: Manual PickList Value Entry
